title: Snowdown Shop!
body: So i got challenger ahri in my snowdown shop off for 50% and i cant buy it. Can a rioter help me out with this

replies.body:
Hey Raygor,

At this time, you're advised to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support so that they can assist you further. You can do that on the Riot Games Support website at: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
